price: Enti εberε a wͻde no kͻeε na wͻn nyinaa gye too mu sε wͻde no bεto abura amena (donkodonko) no mu no, Yɛyi kyerεε no (Yosef) sε: “(Nyame pε a daakye bi) nokorε sε, wobεbͻ wͻn, wͻn saa asεm yi ho amaneε wͻ aberε a (saa berε no) wͻnhu (sε wone Yosef).
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَن يَجۡعَلُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُم بِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahabū bihi wa-ajmaʿū an yajʿalūhu fī ghayābati al-jubi wa-awḥaynā ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hādhā wahum lā yashʿurūna
